name: Carole L. SCHEIB, a Married Woman, Petitioner v. AP REALTY, INC., a Subsidiary of Bank of N.Y. Mellon, N.A., Respondent

parties: Carole L. SCHEIB, a Married Woman, Petitioner v. AP REALTY, INC., a Subsidiary of Bank of N.Y. Mellon, N.A., Respondent.

opinions.text:
ORDER
PER CURIAM.
AND NOW, this 31st day of May, 2012, the Application for Leave to File a Reply and the Petition for Allowance of Appeal are hereby DENIED.
opinions.author: PER CURIAM.

casebody.head_matter:
45 A.3d 405
Carole L. SCHEIB, a Married Woman, Petitioner v. AP REALTY, INC., a Subsidiary of Bank of N.Y. Mellon, N.A., Respondent.
Supreme Court of Pennsylvania.
May 31, 2012.
